biz.pavonis.hexameter.internal.impl.layoutstrategy

Interface GridLayoutStrategy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGridLayoutStrategy, CustomGridLayoutStrategy, HexagonalGridLayoutStrategy, RectangularGridLayoutStrategy, TrapezoidGridLayoutStrategy, TriangularGridLayoutStrategy

    public interface GridLayoutStrategy
extends java.io.Serializable
    Represents the method of creating a HexagonalGrid corresponding to a given shape.

    • Method Summary

      Creates the Hexagon objects which fit in the shape of the requested layout.
